CTR.Q: What type of chart is this?

VEC.Q: How many series are represented in this stream chart?

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Aether University relative to Crimson Foundation?
SRP.A: Aether University is {above} Crimson Foundation in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Nova Institute relative to Luminara Academy?
SRP.A: Nova Institute is {above} Luminara Academy in the vertical direction.

SRP.Q: What is the vertical (above/below) relationship of the area representing Luminara Academy relative to Nova Institute?
SRP.A: Luminara Academy is {below} Nova Institute in the vertical direction.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the largest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the largest contribution is {Starburst College}.

VPR.Q: Which series contributes the smallest portion to the total research grants awarded?
VPR.A: The series with the smallest contribution is {Crimson Foundation}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Luminara Academy's maximum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Luminara Academy's maximum Research Grants Awarded is in {1969}.

EVJ.Q: Which year is Crimson Foundation's minimum Research Grants Awarded in the streamgraph?
EVJ.A: Crimson Foundation's minimum Research Grants Awarded is in {1969}.

NC.Q: Between 1952 and 1968, was the average total Research Grants Awarded higher or lower than between 1966 and 1971?
NC.A: The average total research grants awarded between 1952 and 1968 was {lower} than between 1966 and 1971.

NC.Q: Between 1959 and 1965, was the average total Research Grants Awarded higher or lower than between 1957 and 1964?
NC.A: The average total research grants awarded between 1959 and 1965 was {higher} than between 1957 and 1964.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1950 higher or lower than in 1969?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1950 was {lower} than in 1969.

NC.Q: Was the total Research Grants Awarded in 1954 higher or lower than in 1959?
NC.A: The total research grants awarded in 1954 was {lower} than in 1959.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, which one held the dominant position for the longest period of time?
MSR.A: {Starburst College} held the dominant position for the longest period of time.

MSR.Q: In this streamgraph, in which year did Starburst College and Luminara Academy first exchange dominant positions?
MSR.A: Starburst College and Luminara Academy first exchanged leading positions in {1951}.
